translation.en: NETFLIX PRESENTS
[Laura] You shouldn't be here.
-♪ No one is perfect enough ♪ -[Laura] I don't have panties.
[in Polish] I couldn't find anything decent.
New house, new wardrobe, but it's still the same old mess.
translation.zh: 新房子 新衣柜 但还是一团糟

translation.en: [screams, in English] What the hell are you doing here?
You're sick people. You know that?
translation.zh: 你们太堕落了 知道吗？

translation.en: [in Polish] You deviants! Freaks! Filthy perverts!
translation.zh: 伤风败俗 离经叛道！堕落腐化！

translation.en: [in English] Massimo, you have to get out of here!
translation.zh: 马西莫 你必须离开这里！

translation.en: It brings bad luck to see the bride before the wedding.
translation.zh: 在婚礼前见到新娘 会带来坏运气的

translation.en: Not to say to bang her and ruin her makeup!
translation.zh: 更别说跟新娘做爱了 把妆都弄花了！

translation.en: [in Polish] You're driving me crazy. You'd give Grandma Krysia a heart attack.
translation.zh: 你们快把我逼疯了 克里西亚奶奶看到都会心脏病发作的

translation.en: -[in English] Are you jealous? -Listen to me.
translation.zh: 你是嫉妒了吗？ 听我说

translation.en: Please have some respect for Polish tradition, okay?
translation.zh: 请尊重一下波兰的传统 好吗？

translation.en: If you want, next time you can join us.
translation.zh: 如果你想要 下次可以三人行

translation.en: Go, go, go!
Adiós, amigos. Ciao, bella!
translation.zh: 拜拜了 朋友！ 回见了 美女！

translation.en: [in Polish] Or whatever you people say.
translation.zh: 或者随便你们那里怎么说吧

translation.en: [in English] See you later, alligator!
[in Polish] It was supposed to be perfect. The wedding, the dress, and you.
translation.zh: 一切都应该是美美的 婚礼、婚纱、新娘 而我呢？

translation.en: And I was supposed to be relaxing.
Just look at you. [scoffs]
I'm not gonna get on your ass about it, but you never smoke.
translation.zh: 我不是要唠叨你 但你以前不抽烟的

translation.en: Whatever. If you wanna pretend to be a badass, fine.
translation.zh: 但如果你想装坏耍酷 那没问题

translation.en: [Olga] But I need to know something.
You haven't told him, have you?
translation.zh: 你还没告诉他 是吧？

translation.en: Okay. None of my business.
translation.zh: 好吧 这件事不关我的事

translation.en: You've been trying to tell him, though, right?
I think about it every day.
Massimo can never know I was pregnant.
translation.zh: 不能让马西莫知道 我当时怀孕了

translation.en: [Olga] That's great.
A dark secret is the foundation of any successful relationship.
translation.zh: 遮掩隐瞒正是夫妻和睦的基础呢

translation.en: [Laura] What should I do?
Tell him I lost the baby in the tunnel where I almost died?
translation.zh: 要我告诉他 隧道的意外 让他的孩子没了 我也差点死掉吗？

translation.en: Do you know what he'd do?
What?
[Laura] These people aren't normal.
A war would break out.
[scoffs] A war? Come on.
You know Massimo.
He never lets things go.
translation.zh: 他从来不会善罢甘休的

translation.en: Know what a "vendetta" is?
translation.zh: 知道“仇杀”是什么意思吗？

translation.en: You do realize we're in Sicily, right?
translation.zh: 我们在西西里岛 你知道吗？

translation.en: I mean, I've heard the word before.
translation.zh: 当然 我听过这个词

translation.en: In movies. Who hasn't? Of course I know what it means.
translation.zh: 在电影里看过 谁没看过呢？ 我当然知道这个词了

translation.en: Oh shit.
I wasn't thinking.
It was the hardest decision of my life.
translation.zh: 这是我做过的最艰难的决定

translation.en: I'm sorry.
You're the strongest woman I've ever met. You know that?
translation.zh: 你是我见过的最坚强的女人 你知道吗？

translation.en: Remember, you're not alone. I'm here for you.
translation.zh: 记住 你不是一个人 我永远支持你

translation.en: So, do you love him?
Okay, let's go.
Help me get ready. I promise I won't forget my panties this time.
translation.zh: 给我补补妆吧 我保证不会忘记穿内裤了

translation.en: Here you go. Pick any color you like.
translation.zh: 给你吧 选一个你喜欢的颜色

translation.en: What am I saying? They're all white.
translation.zh: 我在说什么？全都是白色的

translation.en: [Massimo] Let's run away from all this mess.
translation.zh: 让我们逃离这些嘈杂吧

translation.en: You have one hour.
Then… I'll do whatever I want with you.
translation.zh: 然后…我就要对你为所欲为了

translation.en: No. I'll do whatever I want with you.
translation.zh: 不 是我要对你为所欲为了

translation.en: Sit down.
I don't wanna hurt you.
And now… I want you to fuck me the way I like.
translation.zh: 现在用我喜欢的方式操我吧

translation.en: You think this flower will help make me forget that yesterday
translation.zh: 你以为这朵花 就能让我忘记昨天的事吗？

translation.en: you preferred the company of your Mafia fellows over mine?
translation.zh: 你选择陪着黑手党同伴 而不是陪我

translation.en: Nope.
[Domenico] But it makes you smile.
How do I look like?
Like the first time, baby.
[Laura] It will be a perfect honeymoon, husband.
translation.zh: 我们的蜜月会很完美的 老公

translation.en: [Olga, in Polish] Shit.
[in Italian] Shit.
[Olga, in Polish] You changed your hair!
[in English] Welcome home!
[in Polish] Nice to see you too. I didn't know we had to bring food.
translation.zh: 我也很高兴见到你 我不知道我们应该带食物来呢

translation.en: [Olga] Listen…
I'm living my best life. I fell in love.
translation.zh: 我在充分享受生活 我恋爱了

translation.en: And when exactly did that happen?
You're the last person who should be criticizing me.
translation.zh: 你是最没资格批评我的人

translation.en: I'm wondering how many pieces of furniture I'll need to replace.
translation.zh: 我在想 有多少家具需要更换

translation.en: Would you be so kind as to make a list of everything that's been tainted?
translation.zh: 你们都玷污过哪些家具 能不能麻烦你帮我列一个清单？

translation.en: Want a raspberry? In Italian, it's called "lampone."
translation.zh: 想吃树莓吗？在意大利叫做山莓

translation.en: [Laura] You can stick your lampone up your ass.
translation.zh: 把你的山莓塞进你的菊花吧

translation.en: [in English] I would like to propose you two catch up in a different location
translation.zh: 女士们 我想建议你们 去其他地方叙旧吧

translation.en: 'cause Domenico, now he needs to focus on work.
translation.zh: 因为多梅尼科现在得专心工作了

translation.en: Of course, when he's wearing a normal suit and not…
translation.zh: 当然 他要先换上普通的西装 不能…

translation.en: What is that, a… a cake or something?
translation.zh: 那是什么 是蛋糕吗？

translation.en: [in Italian] Cream.
[in English] Um, I arranged a little trip for you two.
translation.zh: 我给你俩安排了一次短途旅行

translation.en: Do I look like furniture that you can move around?
translation.zh: 我看起来像是 你可以随意移动的家具吗？

translation.en: -I want you to have fun with your friend. -Oh, really?
translation.zh: -我只是希望你和闺蜜玩得开心 -真的吗？

translation.en: -It's not a joke. -[Laura] Why don't you put a leash on me?
translation.zh: -我不是开玩笑 -你为什么不把我拴起来呢？

translation.en: Oh, I can see honeymoon is over.
[in Polish] Shut up.
Calm down. We could use a vacation.
translation.zh: 冷静 我们就去度假呗

translation.en: It's been so long, I've forgotten what alcohol looks like.
translation.zh: 我都忘记酒是什么味道了

translation.en: -[in Italian] I'll be in the office. -All right.
[in Polish] What's on your mind?
Nothing. I'm just enjoying being here.
translation.zh: 我很正常呀 我在这里感觉很好

translation.en: -Is that why you're acting so serious? -[Laura] I'm not.
translation.zh: -所以你才这么严肃吗？ -我没有严肃

translation.en: I just feel bad about Massimo.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得懊悔 对马西莫有些歉疚

translation.en: He's making a real effort. He arranged this trip.
translation.zh: 他在努力呢 为我们安排了这次旅行

translation.en: Sometimes I think I'm just like my mom.
translation.zh: 有时候我觉得 我像我妈一样

translation.en: Nope. Even worse. You're a typical wife.
translation.zh: 不是 更糟 你像是妻子一样

translation.en: Thanks, Olga. I can always count on you.
translation.zh: 谢谢哦 我总是能指望你

translation.en: No worries. Happy to help.
translation.zh: 不用担心 乐意效劳

translation.en: Listen. It's simple, really.
translation.zh: 听着 其实很简单的

translation.en: You know what Massimo likes, so just do that.
translation.zh: 你知道马西莫的脾气 所以你知道要做什么了

translation.en: Oh shit!
I've got an idea.
[in English] It is so late.
I'm sure you can spend a few more minutes with me.
translation.zh: 我相信你可以再陪我几分钟

translation.en: I promise you won't regret it.
I know. [sighs]
But it's very late. I have to leave.
translation.zh: 但已经很晚了 我得走了

translation.en: [Massimo] We're back to our normal life, baby girl, aren't we?
translation.zh: 我们回到正常的生活了 小姑娘 不是吗？

translation.en: [man] Oh yeah. Oh yeah.
-[woman gasps] -[man] You're beautiful.
[Laura, in Polish] Holy shit.
-[in Italian] Shit. -[in Polish] Knock first.
-Get dressed. We're leaving. -[Olga] Domenico isn't going anywhere.
translation.zh: -你应该敲门的 -去穿衣服吧 我们要出发了 多梅尼科还没出去呢

translation.en: I'll be back in 30 minutes.
translation.zh: 奥尔加 我半小时后回来

translation.en: Be ready by then, okay?
translation.zh: 到时候准备好 好吗？

translation.en: At least be dressed.
Or just be out from under him!
translation.zh: 或者至少让他从你身上下去！

translation.en: -[in English] We need to finish. -[both moaning]
[Domenico] Oh yes!
[in Polish] Watch out. Careful! Wait.
translation.zh: 注意你的腿 小心点！ 等等

translation.en: You're filthy rich, and we still have to run on the grass!
translation.zh: 你这么有钱 我们还得在草地上跑！

translation.en: -[in English] Ooh! Hi, George! -[both giggling]
[in Polish] Hey, let me drive this time.
translation.zh: 嘿！ 这次让我开车吧

translation.en: -[sighs] We're here. -Come on.
-Just who will be paying for the damage? -What?
translation.zh: -我们到了 -不行 奥尔加 如果撞坏了 让谁来赔呀？

translation.en: I drive around Włochy in Warsaw. If I can do it there, I can do it here.
translation.zh: 什么? 我在华沙沃契区都能开车 在这里肯定也能行

translation.en: Hop in.
Okay.
[in English] Move out.
-[in Polish] No. Want me to sit and wave? -Scoot over. Come on.
translation.zh: 不要 你想让我坐在车上挥手吗？

translation.en: Okay. I'll sit and wave.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我就坐在车上挥手吧

translation.en: I like it. Just look at me, sitting and waving.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这样 看着我坐在车里挥手吧

translation.en: [in Italian] Bye!
[in Polish] Let's go.
[in Polish] Remember how we met?
translation.zh: 你还记得我们是怎么认识的吗？

translation.en: No.
Remember your mom hanging out the window with a plate in her hand?
translation.zh: 还记得你妈手拿盘子 探出窗外吗？

translation.en: [both, drawn out] Mom!
[Olga] How old were we back then? Six?
translation.zh: 我们当时多大呀？ 六岁吗？

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Even back then, you had powder on your plate.
translation.zh: 那时候 你的盘子里就有白粉了

translation.en: Hey! It was just powdered Jell-O.
We ate it with our fingers and went roller-skating. Remember?
translation.zh: 我们会用手蘸着吃 然后去滑旱冰 还记得吗？

translation.en: Honestly? I prefer life now, 20 years later.
translation.zh: 要说实话吗？我更喜欢20年后的现在

translation.en: My skates weren't as fast as the Ferrari. Not for lack of trying.
translation.zh: 我的旱冰鞋没有法拉利跑得快 怎么尝试都不行

translation.en: You know what?
What?
It doesn't matter what we drive or what we eat,
translation.zh: 不管我们开什么车 吃什么

translation.en: as long as we're together.
Forever.
With you, I don't even mind having to walk everywhere.
translation.zh: 跟你在一起 我可以走到天涯海角

translation.en: [Olga] Love you.
I love you too.
-[in Italian] How is everything? -Great.
translation.zh: 一切都好吗？ -是的 谢谢 -很好 谢谢

translation.en: Great, thanks.
translation.zh: -是的 谢谢 -很好 谢谢

translation.en: [in Polish] I've missed this.
translation.zh: 我很怀念我们这样闺蜜小聚

translation.en: [Laura] Lately, everything's gone sideways. Yep.
Oh shit.
[in Polish] I guess we're not having dessert.
translation.zh: 看来这次来不及吃甜品了

translation.en: [in English] We're leaving.
[in Polish] Did you hear that?
translation.zh: 我们得走了 你听见了吗？

translation.en: [in English] I said… we're leaving.
Don Massimo Torricelli,
I have needs.
I know that our beginnings were quite rough,
translation.zh: 我知道 我们的初识很不愉快

translation.en: or more like sick.
You've kidnapped me, and this is sick.
translation.zh: 你把我绑架了 太变态了

translation.en: But I fell in love with you, and we are together because I decided.
translation.zh: 但我爱上你了 我们走到一起 是因为我决定要这样

translation.en: You cannot control people, and I won't let you control me.
translation.zh: 你不能控制别人 我不会让你控制的

translation.en: -I'm your wife, not one of your soldiers. -What are you talking about?
translation.zh: -我是你的妻子 不是你的手下 -你在说什么？

translation.en: -I just want to protect you. -[Laura] This is not protection.
translation.zh: 我不想控制你 我只想保护你 这不是保护

translation.en: This is prison.
I can't live without doing anything.
translation.zh: 我活着不能什么事都不做呀

translation.en: I miss challenges.
[Massimo] You're right, my girl. I screwed this up. ♪ You were in love with me ♪
translation.zh: 你说的对 我的宝贝 是我搞砸了

translation.en: [echoing] Excuse me.
Mrs. Torricelli, right?
I didn't want to disturb you.
-[song fades] -Mrs. Torricelli, right?
Yeah.
Laura.
I'm the new gardener, Nacho.
translation.zh: 我是新来的花匠 纳乔

translation.en: [Laura] Nacho?
Nacho. Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 纳乔 很高兴认识你

translation.en: You have a nice cap.
[chuckles] Yes, I know. Thank you.
translation.zh: 是啊 我知道 谢谢

translation.en: [Laura] But Nacho? It doesn't sound very Italian.
translation.zh: 但是纳乔这名字 不像意大利语

translation.en: It's a nickname.
My family has Spanish roots.
translation.zh: 我的家族有西班牙血统

translation.en: And you? Where are you from?
Poland.
Thirsty?
[Nacho] Oh, yes.
Thank you.
How long have you been working for my husband?
translation.zh: 你给我丈夫工作多久了？

translation.en: [Nacho] I just started.
Mr. Torricelli wants some changes in the garden.
translation.zh: 托里拆利先生想让我修整一下花园

translation.en: I have to work.
I wouldn't like to waste your precious time.
translation.zh: 不想浪费你的宝贵时间

translation.en: Wasting my time?
You're talking to a person who has absolutely nothing to do.
translation.zh: 你在跟一个完全无事可做的人说话呢

translation.en: Now my only job is being a… wife.
translation.zh: 现在 我唯一的工作…就是做妻子

translation.en: How pathetic is that?
You're wrong, missus.
Being a good wife is one of the most difficult jobs in the world.
translation.zh: 做一名好妻子 是世界上最困难的工作之一

translation.en: [scoffs] It's why I'm so perfect at it.
'Cause I don't have to do anything.
They cook for me. They clean for me. Even they cut flowers for me.
translation.zh: 有人给我做饭 有人给我洗衣 有人给我修整花园

translation.en: It's why I'm so perfect at doing nothing.
translation.zh: 所以我最擅长无所事事了

translation.en: You are a real busy bee.
That's a great talent.
To be perfect without doing anything.
translation.zh: 不用做什么 就能做到完美

translation.en: [chuckles] Please don't tell me that you also make money by doing nothing.
translation.zh: 拜托 不要告诉我 你无所事事就能赚钱

translation.en: Where do you think it all comes from?
translation.zh: 不然你觉得这些都是从哪里来的？

translation.en: You need to teach me that.
[woman] Mrs. Torricelli!
I must go. Thank you for the water.
translation.zh: 我得走了 谢谢你的水

translation.en: Ah. I will cut some flowers for you.
translation.zh: 我会为你剪下几朵花的

translation.en: It was a pleasure, Laura from Poland.
translation.zh: 这是我的荣幸 来自波兰的劳拉

translation.en: It was a pleasure, Nacho the gardener.
translation.zh: 我也很高兴 花匠纳乔

translation.en: So, let's see what's inside.
Congrats.
You are the owner of your own clothing company.
translation.zh: 你拥有自己的服装公司了

translation.en: So, I know that you love work,
and I want you to be free to do what you love.
translation.zh: 我希望你能自由地做你喜欢的事

translation.en: And I know that you love fashion.
-♪ All I want is you ♪ -[mouthing] I love you.
[Laura] It's hard to get a present for someone who has everything.
translation.zh: 给拥有一切的人准备礼物是很难的

translation.en: But I will give you something I think you should like.
translation.zh: 但我给你的礼物 你肯定会喜欢

translation.en: -What? -♪ I will take care of you ♪
Open it…
if you're brave enough.
Is this a fucking summer-edition proposal?
translation.zh: 这是夏季限定款求婚吗?

translation.en: Or it's real?
[chuckles] Pumpkin.
[in Italian] Will you marry me?
-Yes. [chuckles] -Yes?
-Yes! -[chuckles] Yes!
[in English] Baby.
I don't want to sound impatient, but…
translation.zh: 我不想显得迫不及待 但是…

translation.en: I think that Santa has forgotten me.
translation.zh: 我觉得圣诞老人好像把我忘了

translation.en: Santa is coming.
He will let you know where is the present.
translation.zh: 他会告诉你 礼物是什么的

translation.en: What?
Be patient.
I think I've seen this before.
Now the only thing that's missing is the lion.
This is your present, Don Massimo.
translation.zh: 这是你的礼物 马西莫大佬

translation.en: I trust you.
I want to give you everything you wanna take.
translation.zh: 你想要的 我愿尽数给你

translation.en: Everything is there.
♪ Don't get me wrong ♪
♪ But I don't like promises ♪
Thank you for arranging the arrival of my parents.
translation.zh: 谢谢你安排我父母过来

translation.en: It was a wonderful gift.
[softly] Anything for you.
translation.zh: 为你做什么 我都心甘情愿

translation.en: Don't you miss your family?
Because, besides Domenico, you have nobody.
translation.zh: 因为你的身边现在只有多梅尼科了

translation.en: You had Mario.
It was Mario's own decision to retire.
translation.zh: 是马里奥自己决定退休的

translation.en: I didn't make him do it.
He couldn't deal with…
After the accident, he was blaming himself for what happened,
translation.zh: 那次事故之后 他一直在自责

translation.en: but I know that he couldn't do anything.
translation.zh: 但我知道 他也无能为力的

translation.en: But… he's a man of honor.
translation.zh: 但是…他是一个正直的人

translation.en: And I've lost my right hand.
Yeah.
I know how important he was in your life.
translation.zh: 我知道他在你的生命中有多重要

translation.en: Sometimes I think that, uh,
you feel so lonely…
'cause besides me, you have no one.
translation.zh: 因为除我之外 你没有其他人了

translation.en: No parents, no siblings.
translation.zh: 没有父母 没有兄弟姐妹

translation.en: I have a brother.
But I'd rather not have him.
translation.zh: 但我宁愿没有这个弟弟

translation.en: But… correct me if I'm wrong…
translation.zh: 如果我说错了 你要纠正我…

translation.en: Do we still have something to try out?
translation.zh: 我们还有什么可以尝试的吗？

translation.en: You have a brother? And you didn't tell me about this before?
translation.zh: 你有弟弟？你从来都没跟我说过？

translation.en: I still have some work to do.
No, do not tell me that you're about to leave.
translation.zh: 不要 别告诉我你要走了

translation.en: Massimo.
-Massimo! -[door opens]
[Olga, in Polish] This is one hell of a present.
[Emily, in English] Hello, ladies. I am Emily.
translation.zh: 女士们 你们好 我叫艾米丽

translation.en: -Hello. -I'm glad you're here.
-[both kiss twice] -Thank you so much.
I'm Laura, and this is my best friend, Olga.
translation.zh: 我是劳拉 这是我的好闺蜜奥尔加

translation.en: [in Italian] Hello!
[Emily, in English] Hi.
[in Italian] Let's go.
[in Polish] Luxury is my middle name.
-[in English] Do you like it? -[gasps] Amazing.
If I understand correctly, we have to talk about business
translation.zh: 如果我没理解错 我们得在新年之后

translation.en: after the New Year.
And today we have to make you look like superstars. Is that right?
translation.zh: 今天我们要让你们看起来像超级明星 是这样吧？

translation.en: Sure, sure. But remember, I'm the hot goddess.
translation.zh: 当然 但要记住 我是性感女神

translation.en: You get used to her.
Or not.
[in Italian] Mia, can we begin?
translation.zh: 米娅 可以开始了吗？

translation.en: [Mia] Of course.
Come on in.
[in Polish] Laura, what's going on?
-Nothing. -What do you mean? Something's wrong.
translation.zh: -没什么 -什么意思？肯定有问题

translation.en: -I don't want to talk about it. -Do I have to force it out of you?
I'm pissed off at Massimo.
But I'm not discussing it with him or with you.
translation.zh: 但我不想讨论 不想跟他讨论 也不想跟你讨论

translation.en: I get it. I respect your decision. Booze would help.
translation.zh: 我懂你 我尊重你 我推荐你去喝一杯

translation.en: [in English] It's enough for me. I want to go back.
translation.zh: 我受够了 我想回去

translation.en: [in Italian] Excuse me.
[in English] Can't you see I'm in the middle of a conversation?
translation.zh: 你没看见我正在谈话吗？

translation.en: Yeah. You're so gentle, talking to him,
translation.zh: 是啊 你跟他说话很温和

translation.en: but talking to me, it's a different situation, right?
translation.zh: 但跟我说话就不一样了 是吧？

translation.en: I have one more last conversation.
[quietly] Yeah.
Right.
I'll do my best to be quick.
All conversations are more important than one with me.
translation.zh: 所有谈话都比跟我谈话重要呢

translation.en: [Massimo, in Italian] Excuse me.
[in Polish] Thanks for inviting us. I haven't had this much fun in ages.
translation.zh: 谢谢你邀请我们过来 我好久没有这样开心了

translation.en: Mom, I'm not sure I can say the same about Dad.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我不确定爸爸是不是也这样想

translation.en: If the love of my life is having fun, so am I.
translation.zh: 如果我的此生挚爱开心 那我就开心

translation.en: [Laura] You know what?
You've been married for 30 years,
and I wish Massimo looked at me the same way Dad looks at you.
translation.zh: 真希望马西莫看我的眼神 能像爸爸看你那样

translation.en: Sweetie, you need to understand that marriage is about compromise.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你得明白 婚姻就是妥协

translation.en: Don't you agree, honey?
I wouldn't dare think otherwise.
translation.zh: 我可不敢有不同意见 亲爱的

translation.en: And now… let's dance. Just you and me.
translation.zh: 现在…我们去跳舞吧 就咱俩人

translation.en: [Nacho, in English] Laura?
Do you feel okay?
Get me out from here.
[Laura] Can you stop the car, please?
[quietly] My God.
How could he be so stupid? And with her?
translation.zh: 他怎么能那么傻？还跟她一起？

translation.en: I wish I could go away from here and never come back.
translation.zh: 真希望能离开这里 永远不再回来

translation.en: I'm flying home in a few hours.
translation.zh: 几个小时后 我就要飞回家了

translation.en: We will find a ticket…
if you want to sort things out… away from here.
translation.zh: 如果你想离开这里 去整理思绪

translation.en: Wait for a second.
[voice mail] The number you are trying to reach is currently unavailable.
translation.zh: 您所拨打的电话暂时无法接通

translation.en: -Please try again later. -[line beeps]
[in Polish] Mom, I'm sorry. You were right.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我很抱歉 你说得对

translation.en: I was wrong about Massimo.
After what I saw, I don't want to see him ever again. Obviously.
translation.zh: 看到那一幕之后 我不想再见到他了

translation.en: I need to get away for a while and collect my thoughts.
translation.zh: 我要离开一段时间 整理一下思绪

translation.en: Don't worry about me. I'm safe.
translation.zh: 不用担心 我很安全

translation.en: I love you. I'll call in a few days.
translation.zh: 我爱你 过几天再联系你

translation.en: [in English] Take me anywhere, but take me away from here.
translation.zh: 随便带我去哪里吧 离开这里就好

translation.en: Wow, you look great.
I like you in this outfit.
I took what I found in the closet.
translation.zh: 这是我从衣橱里随便拿的

translation.en: Maybe it's your girlfriend's?
translation.zh: 也许是你女朋友的衣服

translation.en: I think she prefers a sporty style.
Sister's. I don't have a girlfriend, Laura.
translation.zh: 是妹妹啦 我现在没有女朋友

translation.en: These are my sister's clothes.
Come.
Dinner is ready.
Look what I made for you. My favorite dish.
translation.zh: 看看我给你做了什么 我最爱的菜

translation.en: -Paella. -But dinner?
translation.zh: -西班牙海鲜饭 -现在就吃晚饭吗？

translation.en: Did I sleep so long?
It's so nice here.
It's my father's house.
Anyway, my sister Amelia will come by later.
translation.zh: 说起来 我妹妹阿米莉亚一会过来

translation.en: I think you will like each other.
translation.zh: 我觉得你们会喜欢彼此的

translation.en: She's a cool girl.
She's a bit moody.
You know,
pregnancy hormones.
Your sister is pregnant. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 你妹妹怀孕了呀 抱歉

translation.en: Are you okay?
It's just a pity she chose an asshole for the father.
translation.zh: 可惜她选了一个混蛋当孩子父亲

translation.en: Wait a moment.
I have to clean.
[Klara, in Polish] I'm gonna kill him! Excuse me. Leave me alone!
translation.zh: 我要杀了他！ 抱歉 别碰我！

translation.en: [in Italian] Let her through.
[in English] I have no idea where she--
What did you do to her? What did you do to my daughter?
translation.zh: 你对她做什么了？ 你对我女儿做什么了？

translation.en: She recorded a message saying she was leaving you.
translation.zh: 她给我留言 说她要离开你

translation.en: She never wants to see you again.
I knew you were a bad person since I met you.
translation.zh: 刚见到你时 我就知道你是坏人

translation.en: I don't know what you did to her, but I know one thing.
translation.zh: 我不知道你对她做什么了 但我知道一件事

translation.en: If my daughter decided to leave you,
translation.zh: 如果我女儿决定离开你

translation.en: she has a damn good reason for it!
We are going back to Poland.
We'll wait for her to come home.
My husband is already in the car.
translation.zh: 我的丈夫已经在车里了

translation.en: Don't try to stop me.
[in Italian] Bring me Davide and Tommaso. Now.
translation.zh: 把戴维和托马索叫来 快去

translation.en: Go!
[in English] Ignacio has been so sweet since I'm pregnant.
translation.zh: 从我怀孕以后 伊纳修就特别贴心

translation.en: I'm treated like a queen.
How do you know that Nacho doesn't like him?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道 纳乔不喜欢他的？

translation.en: Because he's Sicilian.
I used to like Sicilians.
translation.zh: 我以前很喜欢西西里人

translation.en: You used to love the Sicilians.
translation.zh: 你以前是爱上西西里人了

translation.en: That's even worse.
Wow.
I can see that your brother takes care a lot about you.
translation.zh: 看得出来 你哥哥很关心你

translation.en: Yeah, Nacho is wonderful. The best.
translation.zh: 是啊 纳乔很贴心 他最棒了

translation.en: Just don't tell him I said that. [chuckles]
[sighs] I would like to see him finally settle down with some nice girl.
translation.zh: 希望他以后能找一个好姑娘安定下来

translation.en: Like you. He deserves it.
translation.zh: 像你这样的姑娘 他应得的

translation.en: How do you know I'm nice? You just met me.
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我是好姑娘？你刚认识我

translation.en: Intuition. It never disappoints me.
translation.zh: 直觉 我的直觉很准的

translation.en: And there is something between you two, I hope.
translation.zh: 你俩之间很来电呢 希望是这样

translation.en: Oh, really?
But you know, my life got complicated, so right now, I have to fix it.
translation.zh: 但你知道 我的生活很复杂 现在我得解决问题

translation.en: Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that.
And you know that Nacho worked for me as a gardener?
translation.zh: 你知道纳乔是我家的花匠吗？

translation.en: [Amelia] As a gardener?
Oh my God, my brother will never cease to amaze me.
translation.zh: 天啊 我哥哥总是给我惊喜

translation.en: So, you didn't know what he was doing in Sicily?
translation.zh: 你不知道他在西西里岛做什么吗？

translation.en: [Amelia] Honey, you can't keep up with Nacho.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 谁都跟不上纳乔的节奏的

translation.en: He's the most spontaneous person I know, and he's also very loyal to his family.
translation.zh: 他是我认识的最率性的人 对家人也很忠诚

translation.en: Maybe too loyal sometimes.
-[Nacho grunts] -Nacho! -I did my hair and makeup. Come on. -[softly] Sorry.
translation.zh: 纳乔！我刚做完头发 化完妆 拜托

translation.en: I forgive you.
-Thank you. -You're welcome.
[in Italian] A Sicilian man can only be understood
by a woman born and raised in Sicily.
translation.zh: 只有西西里岛土生土长的女人 才能理解

translation.en: You can't expect a woman who's been living a normal life in Poland
translation.zh: 你不能指望 一个在波兰过着普通生活的女人

translation.en: to be able to handle life with…
translation.zh: 能跟像你一样出色的男人

translation.en: …an extraordinary man such as yourself.
Let's put all that behind us.
Let's join forces and unite our families.
translation.zh: 让我们携起手来 联合家族的力量

translation.en: We will be indestructible.
Thanks for coming.
translation.zh: 谢谢你在这种时候过来

translation.en: I had my doubts, but now I'm sure.
translation.zh: 我曾经怀疑过 但现在我确定了

translation.en: Laura didn't leave on her own.
You were involved.
I'll find out what happened,
and you'll get what you deserve.
translation.zh: 到时候 你不会好下场的

translation.en: You're so good at it.
[clicks tongue] I'm not sure if it was a compliment
translation.zh: 我不确定这到底是赞美

translation.en: or you just cut my balls.
Anyway,
thank you.
[softly] I miss him.
I know.
But tell me one thing.
Why always good girls fall in love with bad guys?
translation.zh: 为什么好女孩总是爱上坏男孩？

translation.en: How do you know I'm good?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我是好女孩？

translation.en: Maybe something's wrong with me because he cheated on me.
translation.zh: 也许我有问题 所以他才出轨的

translation.en: Laura…
don't you ever say that again.
It's not your fault.
A guy cheating on a woman like you must be an idiot.
translation.zh: 一个男人对你这样的女人不忠 那他肯定是白痴

translation.en: Without balls.
-Do you understand? -[both chuckle]
You understand.
Good.
We can watch the movie now.
translation.zh: 我们现在可以看看电影

translation.en: And drink.
Smile.
[Laura] Thank you for letting me stay here.
[softly] You're welcome.
[in Italian] I told you it wasn't going to work and that he'd figure it out.
translation.zh: 我就说没用吧 她会发现的

translation.en: You should have done a better job. I played my part perfectly.
translation.zh: 你应该演技更好一点 我演得很完美了

translation.en: [sighs] It's not like it was difficult!
She doesn't even know Massimo has a twin brother.
translation.zh: 她都不知道马西莫有一个双胞胎弟弟

translation.en: [sighs] I should have listened to my intuition.
translation.zh: 我应该听从我的直觉的

translation.en: -[knocking on door] -Come in.
What do you want?
I have a message.
Spit it out. I don't have all day.
translation.zh: 快说吧 我的时间很紧迫的

translation.en: She's not in Sicily.
-What did you say? -How come?
translation.zh: -你说什么？ -她怎么会不在西西里呢？

translation.en: [man] She left with him.
Please, don't.
[spluttering] I'm just--
You're just a clown.
You just screwed up our plan.
translation.zh: 你把我们的计划搞砸了

translation.en: Everything was ready. All you had to do was pick her up.
translation.zh: 本来全都安排好了 你只需要去接她就行了

translation.en: Will you take care of him…
…or should I do it?
Okay, calm down. Relax.
translation.zh: 好了 冷静 放轻松

translation.en: Have a seat on the couch, okay?
translation.zh: 坐在沙发上吧 好吗？

translation.en: I will take care of it. Come on, now. Easy. Come on.
translation.zh: 去吧 快去 放轻松

translation.en: Okay. Shh.
Relax. It's all right.
translation.zh: 交给我来处理吧 没事的

translation.en: Hey. Hey. Don't worry, okay?
translation.zh: 嘿 别担心 好吗？

translation.en: Have somebody clean up this mess.
Fuck. My pants.
They're new.
[Domenico] Hello?
Yes.
Yes. Okay.
Thank you.
We got confirmation.
He's on the island with him.
translation.zh: 他在岛上了 正在监视他

translation.en: Everything is ready.
He's waiting for the green light.
[Massimo] I know what to do in this kind of situation.
translation.zh: 在这种情况下 我知道应该怎么做

translation.en: We can't be compared to this scum.
translation.zh: 我们不能跟那个混蛋比

translation.en: You know you can only rely on--
translation.zh: 你知道的 你只能依靠…

translation.en: [in English] Hey!
[in Italian] …on yourself.
[in English] I'm here too, if you haven't noticed.
translation.zh: 我也在这里呢 如果你们没注意到的话

translation.en: And if you are talking about Laura, I want to know everything, you understand?
translation.zh: 如果你们是在说劳拉 那我都想知道 明白了吗？

translation.en: Pumpkin, we're trying to do business--
translation.zh: 小南瓜 我们在聊生意呢

translation.en: [in Polish] Don't "pumpkin" me!
[in English] Laura is fucking gone, and you're talking about business?
translation.zh: 劳拉不见了…你们还聊生意呢？

translation.en: [in Polish] No fucking way!
[in English] Baby, please calm down.
I can't calm down. I'm Polish.
translation.zh: 我没法冷静 我是波兰人

translation.en: [in Polish] Dammit.
[in Italian] Wait. Wait.
Sit down.
[softly, in English] Make love with me.
You killed him?
Unfortunately not. He will be fine.
translation.zh: 可惜没有 他会没事的

translation.en: For now.
Are you okay?
[Laura] What happened last night?
Don't think about it.
You are safe here.
Tell me.
[Nacho] Someone broke in.
It's over now. The police will take care of it.
translation.zh: 已经结束了 警方会处理的

translation.en: But… why would anyone break into your house?
translation.zh: 但是…为什么会有人闯入你家呢？

translation.en: And why can an ordinary gardener like you have all of this?
translation.zh: 普通的花匠 怎么会拥有这些呢？

translation.en: What a luxury life.
I told you.
My father is a wealthy man.
I'm trying to become independent of him.
translation.zh: 我在努力自力更生 不依靠他

translation.en: Enjoy.
Sorry, 'cause you helped me in a very difficult moment in my life,
translation.zh: 抱歉 在我最艰难的时候 是你帮了我

translation.en: and right now, I take it out on you.
translation.zh: 抱歉 在我最艰难的时候 是你帮了我 结果我现在还冲你发脾气

translation.en: [Nacho] I deserve it.
[Laura] You do not deserve it.
Sometimes I act so irrational.
translation.zh: 有时候是我太不理智了

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Laura…
it's fine.
Now, let's eat. We have plans for today.
translation.zh: 我们快吃吧 我把今天都安排好了

translation.en: I do appreciate your good spirit, but, you know, because of last night,
translation.zh: 我很欣赏你的乐观 但因为昨晚的事

translation.en: I don't have a good mood to do anything special.
translation.zh: 我没有心情做什么特别的事

translation.en: [Nacho] You're right.
It would be better if we stay at home and get upset about last night.
translation.zh: 我们应该闷在家里 继续为昨晚烦恼

translation.en: So, where do you want to get upset?
translation.zh: 所以 你想去哪里心烦意乱呢？

translation.en: In the dining room?
Or the dancing hall?
Or…
let me take you to a place where you can smile.
translation.zh: 让我带你去一个地方 保准你开心

translation.en: I promise if you don't smile there, we will come back here and weep together.
translation.zh: 我跟你保证 如果你在那里不开心 那我就回来陪你哭

translation.en: Eat, please.
I think this car is so cool.
It's cooler than your husband's spaceship, huh?
translation.zh: 比你丈夫的飞船酷多了 是吧？

translation.en: Corvette, 1992. The best year.
translation.zh: 1992年产的雪佛兰科尔维特是最棒的

translation.en: [Laura] Like wine?
I like this model.
[in Italian] Turn on the air conditioning.
Hello?
What?
Of course. Thanks.
translation.zh: 是的 当然 谢谢

translation.en: What?
They weren't able to find her.
He survived.
Can you go any faster? Hurry up.
[Nacho, in English] Like it?
Yeah.
[Laura] I can say this one is, um, different than I used to drink.
translation.zh: 我感觉这瓶酒 跟我以前喝的酒不一样

translation.en: Or maybe this one guy's just different from the ones you had before.
translation.zh: 也许这位男生 也跟你以前交往过的男生也不一样

translation.en: It's so beautiful here, yeah?
[Nacho] We can only come here by sea.
So, that's the perfect place for a date because you know you can't run away.
translation.zh: 所以这里是完美的约会地点 因为没法逃掉

translation.en: Success is guaranteed.
[Nacho] Yeah. That's true.
I usually come here with all my girlfriends.
translation.zh: 每次交女友 我都会带她来这里

translation.en: From Poland.
Any of those Polish girlfriends ever escape from you?
translation.zh: 那些波兰女生 有谁逃过你了吗？

translation.en: Never.
[Laura] Hold my beer.
[Nacho] I will leave you with my sister for a moment.
translation.zh: 我先把你交给我妹妹了

translation.en: I need to take care of one thing.
[Amelia] Hi, guys.
-Hi. -[Amelia] Hi.
Wow, you look so gorgeous in that dress.
translation.zh: 哇 你穿这条裙子真漂亮

translation.en: -Thank you. -Ladies.
I can see you won't be missing me too much.
translation.zh: 看来你们不会太想我了

translation.en: But I hope you will miss me a little bit.
translation.zh: 但我希望你们还是能想我哦

translation.en: Let's sit.
How are you?
I'm going for a swim.
What's wrong?
I will teach you something.
[Laura] What?
Surfing without waves.
translation.zh: 在没有浪头的时候冲浪

translation.en: [screams] I don't have an outfit! Stop!
No! [squeals]
Now it doesn't matter.
[in Italian] Massimo. Excuse me.
What is it?
Call Tommaso. We have to go. Get everything ready.
translation.zh: 联系托马索 我们得走了 赶紧准备好

translation.en: [Nacho, in English] Are you having a nightmare
or just an erotic dream?
Nobody taught you that gentlemen
translation.zh: 绅士是不能不请自来 进女人卧室的

translation.en: do not come to a woman's bedroom uninvited?
Technically speaking, this is my bedroom
translation.zh: 严格来说 这是我的卧室

translation.en: that I'm sharing with you
so you don't have to sleep on the beach.
translation.zh: 所以你才不用睡在海滩上

translation.en: You must admit
that I am a real gentleman.
Anyway, I just came to tell you that food is ready.
translation.zh: 好了 我是想告诉你 饭菜准备好了

translation.en: Was it… a nightmare or just an erotic dream?
translation.zh: 所以…是恶梦呢 还是春梦呢？

translation.en: -It was sex. -[Nacho] With whom?
With you.
And did you like it to be?
It was pretty good, but in my entire life, I had better.
translation.zh: 挺不错的 但我这辈子体验过更爽的

translation.en: This is my asylum.
One day, I would like to leave here for good with someone like you.
translation.zh: 有一天 我想跟你这样的人 一起永远离开这里

translation.en: But for now, you're stuck here with me, so… I'm not going anywhere… yet.
translation.zh: 但现在咱俩一起被困在这里了 所以…我哪里也不去…暂时是这样

translation.en: We are going to see my father today.
translation.zh: 我们今天要去见我父亲

translation.en: [Laura] And? That makes you worried, or what?
translation.zh: 然后呢？是让你焦虑了吗？

translation.en: I've already met your sister, and you're not going to tell him
translation.zh: 我已经见过你妹妹了 你又不是要告诉他

translation.en: that we're getting married or something like this. So?
translation.zh: 我们要结婚了什么的 所以呢？

translation.en: Massimo will be there.
[in Spanish] Sir, they're here.
Let them wait.
[in English] Who are you?
And stop telling me bullshit about being a gardener.
translation.zh: 别再跟我胡扯 说你是花匠了

translation.en: This is the only moment that you can tell me the truth.
translation.zh: 现在必须跟我实话实说了

translation.en: I am Marcelo "Nacho" Matos,
translation.zh: 我是马塞洛“纳乔”马托斯

translation.en: son of Don Fernando Matos,
translation.zh: 费尔南多马托斯大佬的儿子

translation.en: the head of the local Mafia
translation.zh: 他是本地黑手党的大佬

translation.en: and eternal rival of your husband's family.
translation.zh: 也是你丈夫家族的宿敌

translation.en: So, your father told you to bring me to the island?
translation.zh: 你父亲让你带我来岛上的？

translation.en: No. You came here because you wanted to.
translation.zh: 不是 你来这里 是因为你想来这里

translation.en: What if I didn't want to?
I would've found a way.
[Laura] Fuck.
I was so naive.
I thought that you were my real friend
translation.zh: 我以为你是我真正的朋友

translation.en: and nothing was a coincidence.
Laura, I wasn't faking my feelings for you.
translation.zh: 劳拉 我对你的感觉 不是装出来的

translation.en: So I guess I have to thank you.
'Cause you proved that men aren't good.
translation.zh: 因为你证明了 你并不是好人

translation.en: Only good at lying.
You think I would fake all of this?
translation.zh: 你觉得我能假装出这一切吗？

translation.en: Take you to the beach?
Teach you to surf?
And the kiss?
You didn't feel it was real?
translation.zh: 你感受不到那些都是真实的吗？

translation.en: It was real, like a fairy tale.
And if you think I would fall in love again with a guy who thinks
translation.zh: 如果你认为 我会再次爱上一个

translation.en: he can have me just like that, you're absolutely wrong.
translation.zh: 自以为可以那样占有我的男人 那你就大错特错了

translation.en: 'Cause I've learned from my mistakes,
translation.zh: 因为我已经吸取教训了

translation.en: and I've learned that you're a fuckin' liar.
Laura.
[Nacho] Be rational.
I didn't make you come here.
You came with me because you felt safe.
translation.zh: 你跟我来这里 是因为你有安全感

translation.en: No.
You ruined everything since the moment you hid the truth from me.
translation.zh: 从你对我隐瞒真相的那一刻 你就把一切都毁掉了

translation.en: And I'm done with guys who think that they can do whatever they want.
translation.zh: 我受够那些 觉得自己可以为所欲为的人了

translation.en: Take me there.
Let's end with these gangster games.
translation.zh: 让我们结束这场黑帮游戏吧

translation.en: Fuck. [exhales]
I always dreamed of living in a beach house
translation.zh: 我一直梦想着住在海滨别墅里

translation.en: and opening a surf school.
I was just unlucky to be born into the wrong family.
translation.zh: 生在错误的家庭 是我运气不好

translation.en: My father had different plans for me.
Laura, for God's sake, you are the wife of a Mafia boss.
translation.zh: 劳拉 拜托 你是黑手党老大的妻子

translation.en: You know how important the loyalty is for the family.
translation.zh: 你知道忠诚对家族有多重要

translation.en: When the Mob boss is your father, you don't have much choice.
translation.zh: 当黑帮老大是你父亲时… 你也别无选择

translation.en: [Laura] No. You always have a choice.
translation.zh: 不是的 你总是有选择的

translation.en: The thing is, you have to take responsibility of your own life.
translation.zh: 重点是你必须为自己的人生负责

translation.en: [in Spanish] We'll take care of her now.
translation.zh: 从现在开始 我们会照顾好她的

translation.en: No. She's coming with me.
Don Matos asked you to come alone.
translation.zh: 马托斯大佬要求你自己进去

translation.en: Nobody told me about that.
He already has guests.
[in English] Laura.
What?
-Be careful. -[Laura] Oh, really?
I don't think anything worse than the last few days could happen.
translation.zh: 我认为不会发生 比过去几天更糟糕的事情了

translation.en: Thank you for accepting the invitation to the meeting.
translation.zh: 谢谢你接受这次会面的邀请

translation.en: [Massimo] I didn't really have a choice.
Oh, I would like to apologize that we are meeting
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 要在这样不愉快的情况下会面

translation.en: in such unpleasant circumstances, but I believe that, as a businessman,
translation.zh: 但我相信 作为一个商人

translation.en: you will understand that the goal justifies the means.
translation.zh: 你也能明白 为了达到目的 可以不择手段

translation.en: After all, the stakes are high.
Our family had the non-aggression pact.
translation.zh: 我们家族之间有过互不侵犯协定

translation.en: You violated it.
Oh, your father and I, we were both men of honor.
translation.zh: 我和你父亲都是正直的人

translation.en: As long as he was alive,
we both respected the borders of our interests.
translation.zh: 我们都很尊重各自的利益边界

translation.en: [takes a deep breath] But you, Massimo,
you're expanding too much.
Some people don't like it.
Some people?
Some people, who?
You?
[Fernando] We have been sending you warnings.
translation.zh: 我们一直在向你发出警告

translation.en: Laura's accident.
But you were too convinced of your own strength.
translation.zh: 但你太相信自己的力量了

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Your father was wise.
He knew that no opponent should be taken lightly.
translation.zh: 他知道任何对手都不能掉以轻心

translation.en: I cannot bear…
more chances with you as a boss.
All the families would benefit from someone more, uh,
translation.zh: 如果有一个更容易控制的人取代你

translation.en: controllable to be in your place.
translation.zh: 那所有黑手党家族都能从中受益

translation.en: We figured your stupid brother will do perfect.
translation.zh: 我们觉得你的傻弟弟就是完美的选择

translation.en: He's so blinded with revenge and greed
translation.zh: 他被复仇和贪婪蒙蔽了双眼

translation.en: that he doesn't care much for the family business.
You're wrong.
You're wrong… if you think I'm gonna put my father's empire
translation.zh: 你说错了…如果你认为 我会把我父亲的帝国

translation.en: into the hands of a dog.
Sit down. Massimo--
[panting] A traitor who put my dad into the hands of Death!
translation.zh: 一个把我父亲推到死神手中的叛徒！

translation.en: You're fucking wrong!
Let me remind you that your wife is still with us.
translation.zh: 让我提醒你 你的妻子还在我们这里

translation.en: You call yourself a man of honor?
translation.zh: 你还有脸说自己是正直的人？

translation.en: And you use my wife this way?
translation.zh: 竟然这样利用我的妻子？

translation.en: Massimo, coming here with Nacho was Laura's decision.
translation.zh: 马西莫 跟纳乔一起来这里 是劳拉自己决定的

translation.en: Nobody made her do it.
I need to see my wife.
I need to see my wife. Now.
Oh, I can assure you that she's safe.
translation.zh: 我可以向你保证 她很安全

translation.en: Marcelo brought her to the island and has been taking care for her.
translation.zh: 马塞洛把她带到岛上以后 一直在照顾她

translation.en: Now she's with Miguel, my personal bodyguard.
translation.zh: 现在她和我的私人保镖米格尔在一起

translation.en: [Nacho, in Spanish] Father.
-You said Laura's with Miguel? -[Fernando] Yes.
translation.zh: -你说劳拉和米格尔在一起？ -是的

translation.en: I wanted to make sure she'd be safe.
Laura left with Enrique and the other bodyguard.
translation.zh: 劳拉跟恩里克和另一个保镖离开了

translation.en: [in English] What?
[in Spanish] Find her.
[in English] We need to go. Now.
[Laura] You were the biggest mistake of my life.
translation.zh: 你是我这辈子最大的错误

translation.en: How could you?
How could you?
You're not Massimo.
No. [sniffles]
I'm not.
[inhales sharply] I am Adriano Torricelli.
translation.zh: 我是阿德里亚诺托里拆利

translation.en: The twin brother who was so unlucky because he was born ten minutes later.
translation.zh: 我是不走运的双胞胎弟弟 因为我晚出生十分钟

translation.en: Ten minutes. Ten minutes.
But it's nice to meet you,
baby girl.
[Laura] Do not call me "baby girl."
-Where is Massimo? -[Adriano] He's not too far.
translation.zh: 马西莫在哪里？ 他就在附近

translation.en: Not too far. [inhales sharply]
But I think that you have to wait a little longer.
translation.zh: 但我觉得你还得再等一段时间

translation.en: He's a busy man.
[clicks tongue] Yeah, I'm happy to spend a lot of time with my new sister-in-law,
translation.zh: 是啊 我很高兴 能多陪陪新嫂子

translation.en: you know, and have a little chat with her.
translation.zh: 你懂的 跟嫂子好好聊聊

translation.en: We have nothing to talk about.
I disagree.
I'm gonna tell you a story about taking back what's mine.
translation.zh: 我要给你讲讲 我将如何夺回原本属于我的东西

translation.en: I mean, my dad is no longer an obstacle, yeah.
translation.zh: 我是说 我爸爸不再是障碍了

translation.en: And now…
Yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
[spluttering] I have to get rid of your husband.
Don't worry, Laura. [chuckles]
I won't leave you alone with him.
translation.zh: 我不会让你单独跟他在一起的

translation.en: -[music fades] -[Laura] What are you doing here?
What does it look like I'm doing? [scoffs]
[sighs] I'm winning.
Massimo made a huge mistake
translation.zh: 马西莫犯了一个巨大的错误

translation.en: by underestimating the anger of the abandoned woman.
translation.zh: 他低估了被抛弃的女人 心中有多愤怒

translation.en: What are you doing here?
You were supposed to wait in Sicily until the negotiations were over.
translation.zh: 你应该在西西里岛等待谈判结束的

translation.en: You know them?
Honey, we were the ones who pushed you into his arms.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 是我们把你推到他怀里的

translation.en: [in Italian] Did you really think you could just say the word
translation.zh: 你真以为 简单一句话

translation.en: and I'd disappear from your life?
translation.zh: 就能让我像狗一样 从你的生活中消失吗？

translation.en: That I would've lived off your handouts in exile?
translation.zh: 我会接受你的仁慈 选择去流亡吗？

translation.en: No, Massimo. No.
translation.zh: 不会的 马西莫 不会的

translation.en: You finally showed your weakness.
translation.zh: 你终于暴露出你的弱点了

translation.en: Question is,
do you really think this little whore's worth the whole empire our father created?
translation.zh: 你真觉得这个小婊子 能抵得上父亲创造的大帝国吗？

translation.en: Though I have to say, she's not bad. [kisses]
translation.zh: 不过我要说 她是挺不错的

translation.en: [in English] Sometimes I wonder
if your child
would've looked more like you…
[smacks lips] …or like her.
It's a pity.
It's a pity that we will never know.
Because of the accident.
